solution_line_template: Chad's cat food total was {packages_cat_food} packages * {cans_per_cat_package} cans = <<{packages_cat_food}*{cans_per_cat_package}={total_cat_food_cans}>>{total_cat_food_cans} cans of cat food.
Chad's dog food total was {packages_dog_food} packages * {cans_per_dog_package} cans = <<{packages_dog_food}*{cans_per_dog_package}={total_dog_food_cans}>>{total_dog_food_cans} cans of dog food.
Chad had {total_cat_food_cans} cans of cat food - {total_dog_food_cans} cans of dog food = <<{total_cat_food_cans}-{total_dog_food_cans}={difference_cans}>>{difference_cans} more cans of cat food.
